*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Saucedo, August 14, 1826. Informing him of the calling of meeting of representatives to concert plans of defense and offense against Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Under existing circumstances in reference to the hostile *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*, I have deemed it necessary to call a *person_mentioned*board*/person_mentioned*, composed of two *person_mentioned*persons elected*/person_mentioned* by each of the *person_mentioned*six sections of this jurisdiction*/person_mentioned*, for the purpose of deciding upon a system of defence, and contriving plans to raise a fund for the assistance of the most exposed *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*, and to keep a body of *person_mentioned*spies */person_mentioned*on the *location_mentioned*frontier*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*This board will assemble on the *date_mentioned n="08-21-1826">21st Instant*/date_mentioned*, and I shall inform your *person_mentioned*Lordship */person_mentioned*of the result of their deliberations, prior to carrying any of the adopted measures into execution*/p*.
*p*I consider that good feeling and perfect union among the *person_mentioned*Colonists*/person_mentioned*, are of paramount importance in time of war; and, that the idea of consulting them was the best mode of attaining the desired object, in the measures to be adopted for the common defence*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="08-14-1826">August 14th 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
